root.name: Raven Squad: Operation Hidden Dagger
root.description: Each of the eight squad members possesses distinctive skills and weaponry that are supposedly complimented by the game's story driven objectives.The game allows players to switch freely between first-person shooter gameplay and an overhead camera view that allows the player to issue simple movement or attack orders to their squad, referred to inaccurately by the game's advertising and packaging as "real-time strategy" gameplay.

similar_games.game: Stalin vs. Martians: The Unknown Pages of the Second World War
